participant_1.name: Tina
participant_1.personality: Creative and nostalgic, Tina enjoys expressing herself through dance and has a strong affinity for music from her youth.
participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80 s. i love new kids on the block.

participant_2.name: Marcus
participant_2.personality: Dedicated and caring, Marcus balances his professional life as a doctor with being a supportive father to his talented daughter.
participant_2.background: my favorite movie is friday. i'm now looking for a new job. i'm a doctor. my daughter is a child prodigy. i enjoy going to the park.

content.text: Hiya! i like to dance and dance
